description: This file provides utility functions for generating PowerPoint presentations using the 'pptxgenjs' library. It includes functions to add various content elements to slides, such as titles, subtitles, body text, bullets, and images, and exposes a main API for creating and downloading PPTX files based on a JSON schema template and user content.

methods.name: slideSizeFromAspect(aspect)
methods.description: Determines the slide layout based on the aspect ratio string.

methods.name: addTopAccent(slide, theme)
methods.description: Adds a subtle top bar accent shape to a slide.

methods.name: addTitle(slide, text, theme)
methods.description: Adds a title text box to a slide.

methods.name: addSubtitle(slide, text)
methods.description: Adds a subtitle text box to a slide.

methods.name: addBodyText(slide, text)
methods.description: Adds a body text box to a slide.

methods.name: addBullets(slide, bullets)
methods.description: Adds a bulleted list to a slide after normalizing bullets.

methods.name: addImage(slide, imageDataUrl, opts)
methods.description: Adds an image to a slide.

methods.name: generatePptx({ template, content, theme, globalFirstSlide })
methods.description: Main function to generate a PPTX presentation object based on template, content, and theme.

methods.name: downloadPptx({ template, content, theme, fileName, globalFirstSlide })
methods.description: Generates and triggers download of the PPTX file in the browser.

ctags.name: downloadPptx
ctags.pattern: /^export async function downloadPptx({ template, content, theme, fileName, globalFirstSlide }) {$/

ctags.name: generatePptx
ctags.pattern: /^export async function generatePptx({ template, content, theme, globalFirstSlide }) {$/
